traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The rasa's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: mage hand, message * 1/day each: disguise self, silent image

traits.name: Mask of Shadows
traits.desc: The alley stalker has a mask enchanted to make them a threat in shadowed areas and when striking the first blow on an enemy. The alley stalker has advantage on stealth checks and its attacks against surprised enemies are always considered a critical hit.

traits.name: Inscrutable Intentions
traits.desc: The rasa is immune to any magical effects to determine if it is lying.

traits.name: Sight of the Rasa
traits.desc: The rasa share a special sight that is invisible to all non-rasa creatures. As an action, a rasa can touch a creature and place a secret mark on that creature's chest. This mark lets other rasa know whether or not this creature should be regarded as a friend or a foe.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The rasa makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Poisoned Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) poison damage.
